metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17912 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: In GraphicsMagick 1.4 snapshot-20171217 Q8, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in ReadNewsProfile in coders/tiff.c, in which LocaleNCompare reads heap data beyond the allocated region. It was discovered that GraphicsMagick incorrectly handled certain image files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.27-3').
